body.p:
Danville Ky June 20th 1861
P Swigert Esqr
Dear Sir --

We have organised a Military Company in our town, of the Older men -- and call the company -- the Danville Silver Greys -- for home protection -- We want arms -- Understanding you are Secty of the State Military board -- Would like to know if the state has the arms -- If our Company can get any -- and what -- do you require --

Yours Truly
Tho Barber
4
Thomas Barber
Home Guards
Boyle Co
Recd of any 24 June 1861.
